articles.description:
RT Emmett
ICYMI: 
An insightful article by @daisugist that goes over how conflicts of obligations (reverse agency problem) within a DAO can be offset by incorporating an independent judiciary to handle certain parts of the dispute resolution process. https://blog.kleros.io/independent-judiciaries-for-sovereign-daos/
